companyName.title: Company Name
companyName.inputTitle: It must be 2 - 50 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, parentheses, periods, and comma.

password.title: Password
password.inputTitle: It must contain at least one letter, one numeral, and eight characters.

header.caution: Use at least one letter, one numeral, and eight characters.
header.agreement: By clicking Create Account, you agree to our Terms and that you have read our Privacy Policy, including our Cookie Use.

aboutUs.title: How Factory Hunt Works
aboutUs.desc: Factory Hunt is a supplier search engine and helps connect suppliers to buyers.

item1.title: Create Your Company Profile
item1.desc: Create a company profile in just a few clicks.

item2.title: Update Product Information
item2.desc: Simply upload your PDF catalog to create a web product catalog.

item3.title: Connecting with buyers
item3.desc: Your product information will be automatically collected by search engine bots and appear in search results.

features.title: Why Factory Hunt?
features.desc: Factory Hunt is a technology company that makes simple, powerful services for suppliers and buyers.

item1.title: User-friendly Design
item1.desc: Factory Hunt is optimized for desktop and all mobile devices. It also offers an intuitive and distinctive design.

item2.title: Customized URL
item2.desc: Introduce your products to buyers quickly and easily by sharing customized URL.

item3.title: Easy to Use
item3.desc: It"s simple and easy to update company profile and product information.

item4.title: Search Engine Exposure
item4.desc: When you update your product information, it will be automatically collected by search engine bots and appear in search results.

item1.review: I finally have a nice-looking homepage and can't belive it's free!
item1.company: by a packaging material manufacturer in Yeosu, South Korea

item2.review: It was extremely easy to upload my PDF catalog and have it online!
item2.company: by a cosmetic manufacturer in Gyeongsangnam-do, South Korea

item3.review: It is REALLY easy to use and keep my information updated.
item3.company: by an LED manufacturer in Jeollabuk-do, South Korea

item4.review: I used to share PDF catalog with potential buyers and now just share a link of my online catalog.
item4.company: by a auto parts manufacturer in Daejeon, South Korea

item5.review: Thank you! I now have a better-looking homepage than the paid one.
item5.company: by a toy manufacturer in Busan, South Korea
